Ed Sheeran will perform his love song Perfect at the Jubilee Pageant in a special moving tribute to the Queen and her late husband, the Duke of Edinburgh.

articles.title: UK authorities 'will seek to formally extradite Kevin Spacey from US' for sexual assault charges - Daily Mail
articles.description: British authorities are considering the formal extradition of Kevin Spacey from the US over four sexual assault charges, unless he comes to the UK voluntarily, to be formally charged.
articles.content:

articles.title: PETA fears Prince William's horse could have been lowering its head because it was hurt - Daily Mail
articles.description: An American animal rights group has said that Prince William's horse could have been lowering its head at the Trooping the Colour rehearsal because it was injured, after claims last night that it was 'drugged'.
